hooks.command: [ "$CLAUDE_CODE_REMOTE" = "true" ] && uv python install 3.12 && uv venv --python 3.12 .venv312 && . .venv312/bin/activate && uv pip install -q -r requirements.txt || true

[ "$CLAUDE_CODE_REMOTE" = "true" ] && service postgresql start && sed -i 's/local\s\+all\s\+all\s\+peer/local all all trust/' /etc/postgresql/*/main/pg_hba.conf && service postgresql restart && su - postgres -c 'createdb simonwillisonblog 2>/dev/null' || true
